languages.text: {n}Наместник долго смотрит на вас своими прозрачными глазами, а затем спокойно произносит:{/n} "Я не владею языком {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}аристократии{/d}, но надеюсь, что вы не сказали ничего оскорбительного. В любом случае, вы обозначили дистанцию между нами, и я учту это".

traits.locale_text: {n}Наместник долго смотрит на вас своими прозрачными глазами, а затем спокойно произносит:{/n} "Я не владею языком аристократии, но надеюсь, что вы не сказали ничего оскорбительного. В любом случае, вы обозначили дистанцию между нами, и я учту это".

languages.text: {n}He gives you a long look, then says calmly,{/n} "I'm not versed in the language of the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}aristocracy{/d}, but I do hope that you didn't say anything unsavoury. Either way, you've established a certain distance between us, and I will make note of it."
languages.original_text: {n}Наместник долго смотрит на вас своими прозрачными глазами, а затем спокойно произносит:{/n} "Я не владею языком {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}аристократии{/d}, но надеюсь, что вы не сказали ничего оскорбительного. В любом случае, вы обозначили дистанцию между нами, и я учту это".

traits.locale_text: {n}He gives you a long look, then he says calmly,{/n} "I'm not versed in the language of the aristocracy, but I do hope that you didn't say anything unsavory. Either way, you've established a certain distance between us, and I will make note of it."

{n}He gives you a long look, then he says calmly,{/n} "I'm not versed in the language of the aristocracy, but I do hope that you didn't say anything unsavory. Either way, you've established a certain distance between us, and I will make note of it."

{n}He gives you a long look, then says calmly,{/n} "I'm not versed in the language of the aristocracy, but I do hope that you didn't say anything unsavoury. Either way, you've established a certain distance between us, and I will make note of it."

{n}He gives you a long look, then says calmly,{/n} "I'm not versed in the language of the aristocracy, but I do hope that you didn't say anything unsavoury. Either way, you've established a certain distance between us, and I will make note of it."

{n}He gives you a long look, then says calmly,{/n} "I'm not versed in the language of the aristocracy, but I do hope that you didn't say anything unsavoury. Either way, you've established a certain distance between us, and I will make note of it."

languages.text: {n}ヴラダイムはこちらをじっと見つめ、静かに言う。{/n}「{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}貴族階級{/d}の言葉には詳しくないが、不愉快な内容ではないことを祈ろう。いずれにせよ、君はこちらと一線を引いたので、そのことは覚えておくよ」
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a long look, then says calmly,{/n} "I'm not versed in the language of the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}aristocracy{/d}, but I do hope that you didn't say anything unsavoury. Either way, you've established a certain distance between us, and I will make note of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴラダイムはこちらをじっと見つめ、静かに言う。{/n}「{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}貴族階級{/d}の言葉には詳しくないが、不愉快な内容ではないことを祈ろう。いずれにせよ、君はこちらと一線を引いたので、そのことは覚えておくよ」

languages.text: {n}他久久地看了你一眼，然后平静地开了口。{/n}“我并不精通{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}贵族{/d}的语言，但我真心希望您说的不是什么难听的话。无论如何，您已经在我们之间划下了一道鸿沟，我会记住这一点的。”
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a long look, then says calmly,{/n} "I'm not versed in the language of the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}aristocracy{/d}, but I do hope that you didn't say anything unsavoury. Either way, you've established a certain distance between us, and I will make note of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}他久久地看了你一眼，然后平静地开了口。{/n}“我并不精通贵族的语言，但我真心希望您说的不是什么难听的话。无论如何，您已经在我们之间划下了一道鸿沟，我会记住这一点的。”

languages.text: {n}Te mira durante un buen rato y dice con calma:{/n} «No soy ducho en los hablares de la {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}aristocracia{/d}, pero espero que no haya dicho nada de mal gusto. En todo caso, tomaré buena nota de la distancia que ha establecido en nuestra relación».
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a long look, then says calmly,{/n} "I'm not versed in the language of the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}aristocracy{/d}, but I do hope that you didn't say anything unsavoury. Either way, you've established a certain distance between us, and I will make note of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Te mira durante un buen rato y dice con calma:{/n} «No soy ducho en los hablares de la aristocracia, pero espero que no haya dicho nada de mal gusto. En todo caso, tomaré buena nota de la distancia que ha establecido en nuestra relación».

languages.text: {n}Il vous lance un regard appuyé, avant de poursuivre calmement :{/n} « Je ne maîtrise pas bien la langue de l'{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}aristocratie{/d}, mais j'espère que vous ne venez pas de m'insulter. Dans un cas comme de l'autre, vous venez d'établir une distance entre nous et j'en prends bonne note. »
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a long look, then says calmly,{/n} "I'm not versed in the language of the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}aristocracy{/d}, but I do hope that you didn't say anything unsavoury. Either way, you've established a certain distance between us, and I will make note of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il vous lance un regard appuyé, avant de poursuivre calmement :{/n} « Je ne maîtrise pas bien la langue de l'aristocratie, mais j'espère que vous ne venez pas de m'insulter. Dans un cas comme de l'autre, vous venez d'établir une distance entre nous et j'en prends bonne note. »

languages.text: {n}Er sieht dich lange an und sagt dann ruhig:{/n} "Ich bin der Sprache der {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}Aristokratie{/d} nicht mächtig, hoffe aber, Ihr habt nichts Unangemessenes gesagt. Jedenfalls habt Ihr dadurch eine gewisse Distanz zwischen uns etabliert, und ich werde mir das merken."
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a long look, then says calmly,{/n} "I'm not versed in the language of the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}aristocracy{/d}, but I do hope that you didn't say anything unsavoury. Either way, you've established a certain distance between us, and I will make note of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er sieht dich lange an und sagt dann ruhig:{/n} "Ich bin der Sprache der Aristokratie nicht mächtig, hoffe aber, Ihr habt nichts Unangemessenes gesagt. Jedenfalls habt Ihr dadurch eine gewisse Distanz zwischen uns etabliert, und ich werde mir das merken."

languages.text: {n}Sana uzun uzun baktıktan sonra sakince cevap veriyor.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}Aristokrasi{/d} diline hâkim olmamakla birlikte nahoş bir şey söylemediğinizi umuyorum. Her hâlükârda aramıza mesafe koydunuz, bunu dikkate alacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a long look, then says calmly,{/n} "I'm not versed in the language of the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}aristocracy{/d}, but I do hope that you didn't say anything unsavoury. Either way, you've established a certain distance between us, and I will make note of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sana uzun uzun baktıktan sonra sakince cevap veriyor.{/n} "Aristokrasi diline hâkim değilim ama umarım nahoş bir şey söylememişsinizdir. Her hâlükârda aramıza mesafe koydunuz, bunu dikkate alacağım."
